attributes.action: Put a stop to taking the care element  from pip
attributes.additional_details: This is absolutely shocking to treat people in this way its against their human rights and equality act 2010 . . Surely instead of cutting benefits for disabled people, the moral thing to do would be to introduce a wealth tax on the very wealthiest people in our society , Not taking the help and support off the most vulunerable in society
attributes.background: With liz kendell mp taking the care element pip  off people who have profound disabilities , it going to cause lots of problems for the most vulunerable people in Society who have complex needs , but have low points in a number of areas in the pip  assessment
